    • Constructor Detail

      • GuestHandler

        public GuestHandler(java.net.Socket clientSocket,
                    HostModel myHost)
        The GuestHandler function is the constructor. It sets initializes all the information used for handling the communication between a guest and host. The GuestHandler object handles all the guest requests and sends responses to these requests using other.
        Parameters:
        clientSocket - is the socket the host server created for a guset player
        myHost - Access the HostModel class

    • Method Detail

      • isClientTurn

        public boolean isClientTurn()
        The isClientTurn function returns a boolean value that indicates whether or not it is the guest player's turn.
        Returns:
        A boolean value

      • setClientTurn

        public void setClientTurn(boolean isClientTurn)
        The setClientTurn function sets the boolean value of isClientTurn to true or false.
        Parameters:
        isClientTurn - Determine if it is the client's turn

      • closeAllFiles

        public void closeAllFiles()
        The closeAllFiles function closes all the files that were used to communicate with the guest player.

      • wordOkResponse

        public void wordOkResponse(java.lang.String msgTag,
                           java.lang.String word,
                           java.lang.String row,
                           java.lang.String col,
                           java.lang.String vertical,
                           int score,
                           Word w)
        The wordOkResponse function is called when the requested word was able to be placed on the board. It removes the tiles used in that word from the player's tile rack, adds to their score, and sends a response to the guest payer with the new score and new tiles.
        Parameters:
        msgTag - Tell the client what type of message it is
        word - Pass the word that was verified
        row - the row where the first letter of the word is placed
        col - the column where the first letter of the word is placed
        vertical - Determine if the word is vertical or horizontal
        score - the score earned for the word
        w - is the word object representing the word that was palced on the board

      • challengeFailed

        public void challengeFailed()
        The challengeFailed function is called when the guest player's requested challenge failed. It sends a message to the guest player informing them that they have failed, and decreases their score by 10 points.

      • wordPlacementFailed

        public void wordPlacementFailed(java.lang.String msgTag,
                                Word w)
        The wordPlacementFailed function is called when the word placement fails but the word was dictionary legal. It sends a message to the guest player that their word placement request (query) failed, and then adds all of the tiles from that word back into their tile rack.
        Parameters:
        msgTag - Identify the message type
        w - stores the tiles from the word that was attempted to be placed

      • run

        public void run()
        The run function is the main function of this class. This function is being called each time it is a guest players turn. It handles all communication between the client(guest) and server(host), handles the checks needed to be conducted for each request the guest asked for,as well as updating the board with new words, maintaining a players object representing the guest on the host side and communicating with the game server in the name of the guest.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
